languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, каждый разговор с высокопоставленными лицами я тщательно фиксирую, а после лично заполняю все семь сопроводительных форм". {n}Атилиус привычным движением скручивает заполненный свиток, убирает его и достает новый.{/n} "Ваши слова и суждения в надежных руках".

traits.locale_text: "Ваше Благородие, каждый разговор с высокопоставленными лицами я тщательно фиксирую, а после лично заполняю все семь сопроводительных форм". {n}Он привычным движением скручивает заполненный свиток, убирает его и достает новый.{/n} "Ваши слова и суждения в надежных руках".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, каждый разговор с высокопоставленными лицами я тщательно фиксирую, а после лично заполняю все семь сопроводительных форм". {n}Атилиус привычным движением скручивает заполненный свиток, убирает его и достает новый.{/n} "Ваши слова и суждения в надежных руках".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practiced gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgments are in good hands."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practiced gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgments are in good hands."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practiced gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgments are in good hands."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

languages.text: “大人，每次与高层人士谈话，我都会不厌其烦地进行记录。在这之后，我会亲自填写七份附加表格。”{n}阿蒂利厄斯以熟练的动作卷起了他写好的卷轴，收了起来，之后抽出一份新的卷轴。{/n}“您的言谈与决断都被忠实地记录了下来。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

traits.locale_text: “大人，每次与高层人士谈话，我都会不厌其烦地进行记录。在这之后，我会亲自填写七份附加表格。”{n}阿蒂利厄斯以熟练的动作卷起了他写好的卷轴，收了起来，之后抽出一份新的卷轴。{/n}“您的言谈与决断都被忠实地记录了下来。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, registro con mucho esmero cada una de las conversaciones con figuras de alto rango, y después completo los siete formularios correspondientes personalmente». {n}Atilius enrolla el pergamino cumplimentado con un movimiento experimentado, lo guarda y saca uno nuevo.{/n} «Sus palabras y sus consideraciones están en buenas manos».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, registro con mucho esmero cada una de las conversaciones con figuras de alto rango, y después completo los siete formularios correspondientes personalmente». {n}Atilius enrolla el pergamino cumplimentado con un movimiento experimentado, lo guarda y saca uno nuevo.{/n} «Sus palabras y sus consideraciones están en buenas manos».

languages.text: 「陛下、私は高官の方々とのすべての会話を事細かに記録しているのです。その後、7種類の添付用紙に自分で記録するのです」{n}アティリウスは記入済みの巻物を慣れた手つきで巻き取る。{/n}「陛下のお言葉と判断の記録は、安心してお任せください」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私は高官の方々とのすべての会話を事細かに記録しているのです。その後、7種類の添付用紙に自分で記録するのです」{n}アティリウスは記入済みの巻物を慣れた手つきで巻き取る。{/n}「陛下のお言葉と判断の記録は、安心してお任せください」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich zeichne jedes Gespräch mit hochstehenden Personen exakt auf und fülle anschließend alle sieben zugehörigen Formulare eigenhändig aus." {n}Atilius rollt seine fertige Schriftrolle mit geübter Geste zusammen, verstaut sie und holt eine neue hervor.{/n} "Eure Worte und Entscheidungen sind in guten Händen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich zeichne jedes Gespräch mit hochstehenden Personen exakt auf und fülle anschließend alle sieben zugehörigen Formulare eigenhändig aus." {n}Atilius rollt seine fertige Schriftrolle mit geübter Geste zusammen, verstaut sie und holt eine neue hervor.{/n} "Eure Worte und Entscheidungen sind in guten Händen."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je prends soin d'enregistrer chacune de mes conversations avec des personnages de haut rang, puis je remplis moi-même les sept formulaires associés. » {n}D'un geste habile, Atilius enroule le parchemin qu'il vient de terminer, le range et en sort un nouveau.{/n} « Vos paroles et vos jugements sont en bonnes mains. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je prends soin d'enregistrer chacune de mes conversations avec des personnages de haut rang, puis je remplis moi-même les sept formulaires associés. » {n}D'un geste habile, Atilius enroule le parchemin qu'il vient de terminer, le range et en sort un nouveau.{/n} « Vos paroles et vos jugements sont en bonnes mains. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, yüksek rütbeli kişilerle yaptığım her konuşmayı titizlikle kaydediyor ve müteakiben gerekli yedi formun tümünü bizzat dolduruyorum." {n}Atilius; dolan parşömeni pratik bir hareketle topluyor, yerine koyuyor ve yeni bir parşömen çıkarıyor.{/n} "Sözleriniz ve hükümleriniz emin ellerde."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I painstakingly record every conversation with high-ranking personages, and afterward I fill out all seven accompanying forms personally." {n}Atilius rolls up his completed scroll in a practised gesture, stows it away, and pulls out a new one.{/n} "Your words and judgements are in good hands."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, yüksek rütbeli kişilerle yaptığım her konuşmayı titizlikle kaydediyor ve müteakiben gerekli yedi formun tümünü bizzat dolduruyorum." {n}Atilius; dolan parşömeni pratik bir hareketle topluyor, yerine koyuyor ve yeni bir parşömen çıkarıyor.{/n} "Sözleriniz ve hükümleriniz emin ellerde."
